00068 void SerialDataCallback(void *context, const unsigned char *data, int len)
00069 {
00070         if( len && data_dump )
00071                 barryverbose("ReadThread:\n" << Data(data, len));
00072 
00073         while( len ) {
00074                 int written = write(1, data, len);
00075                 if( written > 0 ) {
00076                         len -= written;
00077                         data += written;
00078                 }
00079                 else {
00080                         barryverbose("Error in write()");
00081                 }
00082         }
00083 }

00085 void ProcessStdin(Modem &modem)
00086 {
00087         // Read from stdin and write to USB, until
00088         // stdin is closed
00089         Data data;
00090         int bytes_read;
00091         fd_set rfds;
00092         struct timeval tv;
00093         int ret;
00094 
00095         // Handle interrupt signals from pppd
00096         signal_end = false;
00097         signal(SIGINT, &signal_handler);
00098         signal(SIGHUP, &signal_handler);
00099         signal(SIGTERM, &signal_handler);
00100 
00101         FD_ZERO(&rfds);
00102         while( signal_end == false ) {
00103                 // Need to use select() here, so that pppd doesn't
00104                 // hang when it tries to set the line discipline
00105                 // on our stdin.
00106 
00107                 FD_SET(0, &rfds);
00108                 tv.tv_sec = 30;
00109                 tv.tv_usec = 0;
00110 
00111                 ret = select(1, &rfds, NULL, NULL, &tv);
00112                 if( ret == -1 ) {
00113                         perror("select()");
00114                 }
00115                 else if( ret && FD_ISSET(0, &rfds) ) {
00116                         bytes_read = read(0, data.GetBuffer(), data.GetBufSize());
00117                         if( bytes_read == 0 )
00118                                 break;
00119 
00120                         if( bytes_read > 0 ) {
00121                                 data.ReleaseBuffer(bytes_read);
00122                                 modem.Write(data);
00123                         }
00124                 }
00125         }
00126 }

00128 int main(int argc, char *argv[])

00131                                         // stdio for debug messages

00143                         if( cmd == -1 )

00171                                 return 0;
00172                         }

00174 
00175                 // Initialize the barry library.  Must be called before
00176                 // anything else.
00177                 // Log to stderr, since stdout is for data in this program.
00178                 std::auto_ptr<std::ofstream> log;
00179                 if( logfile.size() ) {
00180                         log.reset( new std::ofstream(logfile.c_str(), ios::app) );
00181                         Barry::Init(data_dump, log.get());
00182                 }
00183                 else {
00184                         Barry::Init(data_dump, &std::cerr);
00185                 }
00186 
00187                 // Display version if in data_dump mode
00188                 if( data_dump ) {
00189                         int major, minor;
00190                         const char *Version = Barry::Version(major, minor);
00191                         barryverbose(Version);
00192                 }
00193 
00194                 // Probe the USB bus for Blackberry devices and display.
00195                 // If user has specified a PIN, search for it in the
00196                 // available device list here as well
00197                 Barry::Probe probe;
00198                 int activeDevice = probe.FindActive(pin);
00199                 if( activeDevice == -1 ) {
00200                         if( pin )
00201                                 cerr << "PIN " << setbase(16) << pin
00202                                         << " not found" << endl;
00203                         cerr << "No device selected" << endl;
00204                         return 1;
00205                 }
00206 
00207                 const ProbeResult &device = probe.Get(activeDevice);
00208 
00209                 if( !force_serial && device.HasIpModem() ) {
00210                         barryverbose("Using IpModem mode...");
00211 
00212                         // Create our controller object using our threaded router.
00213                         Controller con(probe.Get(activeDevice));
00214 
00215                         // Open serial mode... the callback handles reading from
00216                         // USB and writing to stdout
00217                         Mode::IpModem modem(con, SerialDataCallback, 0);
00218                         modem.Open(password.c_str());
00219 
00220                         ProcessStdin(modem);
00221                         modem.Close();  // graceful close so we can restart without unplugging
00222                 }
00223                 else {
00224                         if( force_serial ) {
00225                                 barryverbose("Using Serial mode per command line...");
00226                         }
00227                         else {
00228                                 barryverbose("No IpModem mode available, using Serial mode...");
00229                         }
00230 
00231                         // Create our socket router and start thread to handle
00232                         // the USB reading, instead of creating our own thread.
00233                         SocketRoutingQueue router;
00234                         router.SpinoffSimpleReadThread();
00235 
00236                         // Create our controller object using our threaded router.
00237                         Controller con(probe.Get(activeDevice), router);
00238 
00239                         // Open desktop mode... this handles the password side
00240                         // of things
00241                         Mode::Desktop desktop(con);
00242                         desktop.Open(password.c_str());
00243 
00244                         // Open serial connection
00245                         Mode::Serial modem(con, SerialDataCallback, 0);
00246                         modem.Open(password.c_str());
00247 
00248                         ProcessStdin(modem);
00249                 }
00250 
00251                 barryverbose("Exiting");
00252 
00253         }
00254         catch( std::exception &e ) {
